channel.title: Nadeshiko
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nadeshiko" - Nadeshiko v2?

item.title: Re: Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded: FoA resets stuff before it calculates friend point hangouts. You should still be able to use FoA combined with one of the ninja jackpot special themes however.

item.title: Re: Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
you need to hang out with 4 of them on the same morning.

That means that you would have to Hang Out Through FP with four guys.

I am not sure how the priority works for FoA (if you can FP Hang Out + FoA on the same day, while getting all the remainding FP reset to 0), but the safest approach would be a 4 person hang out.

Go for the unusual allies, more than four of them are very close to 1500-2000 hang out break line now with the new HO system.

Good luck.

item.title: Nadeshiko
item.content:encoded:
The new Nadeshiko requirements requires that you hang out with all 4 allies during the same dayroll. Does this mean the Floating on Air + Mood Enhancer no longer works to get her? I tried that yesterday, but I did not receive her today.

Basically do I need to report it, or is the old strategy no longer valid?
